DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate whether daily laughter frequency associate pain intensity emotional state rating individual fibromyalgia syndrome .
DOC.detailed_description: Participants ask provide ( authorize researcher obtain ) fibromyalgia diagnosis confirmation health care provider . Initially , participant complete demographic form two screening assessment . Then 14 day , ask rate momentary mood overall pain level three time per day ( shortly wake , around 3:00 p.m. , hour bedtime ) . At time , ask log instance laughter occurs , daily , 14 day . They carry log throughout day order document instance laughter .
